field.name: multipage_toc
field.label: Show Table of Contents
field.description: You may select to hide the Table of Contents, (you can still show the Page Navigation)

field.name: pagination
field.label: Show Page Navigation
field.description: Defines where navigation controls are displayed

field.name: show_prevnext_count
field.label: Show Page Count
field.description: Show current page number out of total page number

field.name: display_method
field.label: Display method
field.description: It is recommended to use the instant navigation to show the selected page. Other options include: (a) showing all pages and scrolling to the desired one, (b) Show current page only and navigate via reloading

field.name: toc_placement
field.label: Table of Contents placement
field.description: You may select to prepend Table of Contents to item's description or placing via item->toc variable in the latter case, please customize item.php/item_htnl5.php of your template

field.name: allpages_link
field.label: Show all pages link
field.description: Display a link to allow user to display all content pages at once

field.name: custom_introtext
field.label: Intro Text
field.description: A custom language string as title of 'Intro Text' link

field.name: custom_allpages
field.label: All Pages Text
field.description: A custom language string as title of 'All Pages' link
